content:
Hey guys,
Is there any work on something similar to this ?
https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/674

Is there any way (or hack) to basically have same dependency twice with different features?
If one is a build dependency and one is a regular dependency, then with resolver = 2. Details at: https://doc.rust-lang.org/edition-guide/rust-2021/default-cargo-resolver.html
Fundamentally features are supposed to be additive.

Oh crap, I completely forgot about resolver = 2.
Thanks for the help
